title: Paranoid Trap - Novel Updates
genre: Josei   Psychological   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Older Love Interests   Short Story   Stalkers
author: 雪刀
description:
Jing Xian fell in love with Nian Gao at first sight. Since then, he has been thinking about her every day. He wants to see her, hug her and even kiss her.

However, before meeting her, he had to learn how to be a normal person.

--

Nian Gao likes Jing Xian’s tenderness and consideration. It was not until later that she knew that being tender and considerate was just an illusion. 

That night, he was like a changed man.
Leaning close to her, he told her, “Do not get close to any man.”>
